verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, that \w after|strong="G5613"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* were \w gotten|strong="G0645"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, and had \w launched|strong="G0321"\w*, we \w came|strong="G2064"\w* with a straight \w course|strong="G2113"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Coos|strong="G2972"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1836"\w* \add day\add* \w following|strong="G1836"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Rhodes|strong="G4499"\w*, and from \w thence|strong="G2547"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Patara|strong="G3959"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w finding|strong="G2147"\w* a \w ship|strong="G4143"\w* sailing \w over|strong="G1276"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Phenicia|strong="G5403"\w*, we went \w aboard|strong="G1910"\w*, and set \w forth|strong="G0321"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* when we had \w discovered|strong="G0398"\w* \w Cyprus|strong="G2954"\w*, \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w left|strong="G2641"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* on the left \w hand|strong="G2176"\w*, and \w sailed|strong="G4126"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Syria|strong="G4947"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w landed|strong="G2609"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w Tyre|strong="G5184"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w there|strong="G1566"\w* the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* to \w unlade|strong="G0670"\w* her \w burden|strong="G1117"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w finding|strong="G0429"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3588"\w*, we \w tarried|strong="G3101"\w* \w there|strong="G1961"\w* \w seven|strong="G2250"\w* \w days|strong="G0847"\w*: \w who|strong="G2033"\w* \w said|strong="G3972"\w* to \w Paul|strong="G3588"\w* \w through|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G3588"\w*, that he \w should|strong="G3361"\w* \w not|strong="G4151"\w* go \w up|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G0305"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G1519"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* \w had|strong="G1096"\w* \w accomplished|strong="G1822"\w* those \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, we \w departed|strong="G1831"\w* and went our \w way|strong="G4198"\w*; and they \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w brought|strong="G4311"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* on our \w way|strong="G4311"\w*, \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w wives|strong="G1135"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*, \w till|strong="G2193"\w* \add we were\add* out \w of|strong="G1854"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* we \w kneeled|strong="G5087"\w* \w down|strong="G1119"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w shore|strong="G0123"\w*, and \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when we had taken our \w leave|strong="G0782"\w* one of \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, we \w took|strong="G1910"\w* \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G1565"\w* \w returned|strong="G5290"\w* home \w again|strong="G2398"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w we|strong="G2249"\w* had \w finished|strong="G1274"\w* \add our\add* \w course|strong="G4144"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Tyre|strong="G5184"\w*, we \w came|strong="G2658"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Ptolemais|strong="G4424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saluted|strong="G0782"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, and \w abode|strong="G3306"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w next|strong="G1887"\w* \add day\add* we that \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w Paul’s company|strong="G3972"\w* \w departed|strong="G1831"\w*, and \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Cæsarea|strong="G2542"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* we \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w* of \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* the \w evangelist|strong="G2099"\w*, which \w was|strong="G5607"\w* \add one\add* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w*; and \w abode|strong="G3306"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the same \w man|strong="G5129"\w* \w had|strong="G2258"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w daughters|strong="G2364"\w*, \w virgins|strong="G3933"\w*, which did \w prophesy|strong="G4395"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* as \w we|strong="G2257"\w* \w tarried|strong="G1961"\w* \add there\add* \w many|strong="G4119"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, there came \w down|strong="G2718"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*, \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Agabus|strong="G0013"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he was \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, he \w took|strong="G0142"\w* \w Paul’s|strong="G3972"\w* \w girdle|strong="G2223"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* his \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Thus|strong="G3592"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, \w So|strong="G3779"\w* \w shall|strong="G1210"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* \w bind|strong="G1210"\w* the \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w owneth|strong="G2076"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w girdle|strong="G2223"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w deliver|strong="G3860"\w* \add him\add* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* we \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* of that \w place|strong="G1786"\w*, \w besought|strong="G3870"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* go \w up|strong="G0305"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* mean \w ye|strong="G4160"\w* to \w weep|strong="G2799"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w break|strong="G4919"\w* \w mine|strong="G3450"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G2192"\w* \w ready|strong="G2093"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to be \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to \w die|strong="G0599"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

And \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w would|strong="G3982"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* be \w persuaded|strong="G3982"\w*, we \w ceased|strong="G2270"\w*, \w saying|strong="G2036"\w*, The \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* be \w done|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w those|strong="G3778"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* we took up our \w carriages|strong="G0643"\w*, and went \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*.

\w There|strong="G1161"\w* \w went|strong="G4905"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \add certain\add* of the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w Cæsarea|strong="G2542"\w*, and brought with \w them|strong="G0071"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w Mnason|strong="G3416"\w* of \w Cyprus|strong="G2953"\w*, an \w old|strong="G0744"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w*, \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* we should \w lodge|strong="G3579"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w we|strong="G2257"\w* were \w come|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w received|strong="G1209"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w gladly|strong="G0780"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \add day\add* \w following|strong="G1966"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* went \w in|strong="G1524"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w James|strong="G2385"\w*; \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* were \w present|strong="G3854"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w saluted|strong="G0782"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, he \w declared|strong="G1834"\w* \w particularly|strong="G1538"\w* what \w things|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* had \w wrought|strong="G4160"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add it\add*, they \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, Thou \w seest|strong="G2334"\w*, \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, how \w many|strong="G4214"\w* \w thousands|strong="G3461"\w* of \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* there \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w are|strong="G5225"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w zealous|strong="G2207"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*:

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they are \w informed|strong="G2727"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* thou \w teachest|strong="G1321"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are \w among|strong="G2596"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* to \w forsake|strong="G0646"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, saying \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w ought|strong="G4059"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to \w circumcise|strong="G4059"\w* \add their\add* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3366"\w* to walk \w after|strong="G4043"\w* the \w customs|strong="G1485"\w*.

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* is \w it|strong="G2076"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*? the \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w needs|strong="G3843"\w* come \w together|strong="G4905"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they will \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* thou art \w come|strong="G2064"\w*.

\w Do|strong="G4160"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* that we \w say|strong="G3004"\w* to \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*: \w We|strong="G2254"\w* \w have|strong="G1526"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* a \w vow|strong="G2171"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G1438"\w*;

\w Them|strong="G5128"\w* \w take|strong="G3880"\w*, and purify \w thyself|strong="G0048"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* be at \w charges|strong="G1159"\w* \w with|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they may \w shave|strong="G3587"\w* \add their\add* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* may \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* those \w things|strong="G3739"\w*, whereof they were \w informed|strong="G2727"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*, \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \add that\add* thou \w thyself|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* walkest \w orderly|strong="G4748"\w*, and \w keepest|strong="G5442"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w As|strong="G1161"\w* \w touching|strong="G4012"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* have \w written|strong="G1989"\w* \add and\add* concluded \w that|strong="G2919"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w observe|strong="G5083"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* such \w thing|strong="G5108"\w*, \w save|strong="G1487"\w* only \w that|strong="G3361"\w* they \w keep|strong="G5442"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G5037"\w* \add things\add* offered to \w idols|strong="G1494"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* from \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* from \w strangled|strong="G4156"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* from \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w took|strong="G3880"\w* the \w men|strong="G0435"\w*, and the \w next|strong="G2192"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* purifying \w himself|strong="G0048"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w entered|strong="G1524"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, to \w signify|strong="G1229"\w* the \w accomplishment|strong="G1604"\w* of the \w days|strong="G2250"\w* of \w purification|strong="G0049"\w*, \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* an offering should \w be|strong="G4374"\w* \w offered|strong="G4376"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* were \w almost|strong="G3195"\w* \w ended|strong="G4931"\w*, the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* which \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w*, when they \w saw|strong="G2300"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, stirred \w up|strong="G4797"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w laid|strong="G1911"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

Crying \w out|strong="G2896"\w*, \w Men|strong="G0435"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2475"\w*, \w help|strong="G0997"\w*: \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, that \w teacheth|strong="G1321"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add* every \w where|strong="G3837"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w*: \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w further|strong="G2089"\w* \w brought|strong="G1521"\w* \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w polluted|strong="G2840"\w* \w this|strong="G5126"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w*.

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* they \w had|strong="G2258"\w* seen \w before|strong="G4308"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w Trophimus|strong="G5161"\w* an \w Ephesian|strong="G2180"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* they \w supposed|strong="G3543"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* had \w brought|strong="G1521"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*.)

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w moved|strong="G2795"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* ran \w together|strong="G4890"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w took|strong="G1949"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, and \w drew|strong="G1670"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* out \w of|strong="G1854"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w forthwith|strong="G2112"\w* the \w doors|strong="G2374"\w* were \w shut|strong="G2808"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* as they went \w about|strong="G2212"\w* to \w kill|strong="G0615"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w tidings|strong="G5334"\w* came \w unto|strong="G0305"\w* the chief \w captain|strong="G5506"\w* of the \w band|strong="G4686"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* was in an \w uproar|strong="G4797"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w immediately|strong="G1824"\w* \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w centurions|strong="G1543"\w*, and ran \w down|strong="G2701"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* when they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* the chief \w captain|strong="G5506"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w*, they \w left|strong="G3973"\w* \w beating|strong="G5180"\w* of \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* the chief \w captain|strong="G5506"\w* came \w near|strong="G1448"\w*, and \w took|strong="G1949"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w commanded|strong="G2753"\w* \add him\add* to be \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* with \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w chains|strong="G0254"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w demanded|strong="G4441"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* he \w was|strong="G1498"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* he \w had|strong="G2076"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G0243"\w* \w cried|strong="G0994"\w* one \w thing|strong="G5100"\w*, some \w another|strong="G0243"\w*, \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* when he \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* the \w certainty|strong="G0804"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w tumult|strong="G2351"\w*, he \w commanded|strong="G2753"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to be \w carried|strong="G0071"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w castle|strong="G3925"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w stairs|strong="G0304"\w*, so it \w was|strong="G4819"\w*, that he was \w borne|strong="G0941"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w violence|strong="G0970"\w* of the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*.
